title: Upcoming Hollywood Movies 2019
body:
New Post has been published on http://muktoprithibi.net/en/upcoming-hollywood-movies-2019/

Upcoming Hollywood Movies 2019

Every single month release new Hollywood Movies. In the bellow list of Upcoming Hollywood Movies in 2019.

Captain Marvel (2019)

Type: Fantasy/Science Fiction
Release date: March 15, 2019 (Japan) Trending
Duration: 2h 12m
Directors: Anna Boden, Ryan Fleck
Based on: Carol Danvers; by: Roy Thomas; Gene Colan
Budget: 152 million USD
Screenplay: Anna Boden, Nicole Perlman, Ryan Fleck, MORE

Captive State (2019)

Type: Thriller/Fantasy
Duration: 1h 49m
Initial release: March 15, 2019 (USA)
Director: Rupert Wyatt
Budget: 25 million USD
Music composed by: Rob Simonsen
Screenplay: Rupert Wyatt

The Curse of La Llorona (2019)

Type: Thriller/Horror
Duration: 1h 33m
Initial release: April 19, 2019 (USA)
Director: Michael Chaves
Producers: James Wan, Gary Dauberman, Emile Gladstone
Production companies: New Line Cinema, Atomic Monster Productions
Screenplay: Tobias Iaconis, Mikki Daughtry

Pet Sematary (2019)

Type: Thriller/Horror
Initial release: April 4, 2019 (Australia)
Directors: Kevin Kolsch, Dennis Widmyer
Production company: Di Bonaventura Pictures
Producers: Lorenzo di Bonaventura, Steven Schneider, Mark Vahradian
Screenplay: Stephen King, Jeff Buhler, David Kajganich

Shazam (2019)

Type: Fantasy/Science Fiction
Initial release: April 5, 2019 (USA)
Director: David Sandberg
Based on: Shazam!; by: Bill Parker; C. C. Beck
Budget: $80–90 million USD
Production companies: Warner Bros., New Line Cinema, Seven Bucks Productions, The Safran Company, DC Films

Hellboy (2019)

Type: Fantasy/Action
Duration: 2h 28m
Initial release: April 12, 2019 (USA)
Director: Neil Marshall
Film series: Hellboy
Production companies: Lionsgate, Dark Horse Entertainment, Campbell Grobman Films, Alchemy
Producers: Lloyd Levin, Lawrence Gordon, Mike Richardson

Avengers: Endgame (2019)

Type: Fantasy/Science Fiction
Initial release: April 26, 2019 (USA) Trending
Directors: Anthony Russo, Joe Russo
Based on: The Avengers; by: Stan Lee; Jack Kirby
Screenplay: Stephen McFeely, Christopher Markus
Story by: Stan Lee, Jack Kirby

John Wick: Chapter 3 – Parabellum (2019)

Type: Thriller/Mystery
Initial release: May 16, 2019
Director: Chad Stahelski
Based on: Characters; by Derek Kolstad
Production company: Summit Entertainment
Producers: Keanu Reeves, Basil Iwanyk, Erica Lee

Aladdin (2019)

Type: Fantasy/Romance
Initial release: May 24, 2019 (USA)
Director: Guy Ritchie
Story by: One Thousand and One Nights
Music composed by: Alan Menken
Producers: Dan Lin, Jonathan Eirich

Dark Phoenix (2019)

Type: Science Fiction/Action
Initial release: June 7, 2019 (USA)
Director: Simon Kinberg
Music composed by: Hans Zimmer
Production companies: Marvel Entertainment, TSG Entertainment, Genre Films
Producers: Simon Kinberg, Bryan Singer, Lauren Shuler Donner, Hutch Parker, Todd Hallowell

Men in Black: International (2019)

Type: Fantasy/Science Fiction
Initial release: June 14, 2019 (USA)
Director: F. Gary Gray
Production companies: Sony Pictures, Columbia Pictures, Amblin Entertainment, Image Nation
Producers: Walter Parkes, Laurie MacDonald
Screenplay: Matthew Hollaway, Art Marcum

summary: Kevin Feige riguardo ai progetti dopo Avengers: Endgame
title: Kevin Feige riguardo ai progetti dopo Avengers: Endgame
body:
Kevin Feige riguardo ai progetti dopo Avengers: Endgame

Per la maggior parte del decennio d’attività e d’incassi al botteghino dei Marvel Studios, ai fan è stata data quasi sempre data una mappa generale su dove il presidente Kevin Feigeintendesse guidare il franchise. Quella strada è diventata fredda negli ultimi due anni a causa delle alte aspettative e della segretezza attorno a Avengers: Endgame. Per fortuna, sembra che il velo di mistero verrà…

blog.name: asxgard
blog.title: asxgard
blog.description: requests closed due to endgame upsetting me heavily I’m crying

tags: i want a happy ending for my heroes
summary: After Strange saw the futures, and the one that they win, then every action he made after that was towards the one scenario in...
body:
After Strange saw the futures, and the one that they win, then every action he made after that was towards the one scenario in which they win, even if they have to lose first. Giving up the stone to spare Tony’s life was a calculated decision! Sure, he probably respected Tony and wanted to spare him regardless.

But! In the situation they come out on top, Tony needed to be spared. If Strange hadn’t done that, Tony would have been killed, and Thanos would have probably got the stone some other way anyways. With the snap, Tony wasn’t going to die, and Strange knew that. He needed to give up the stone so Tony would live. He saw that Tony Stark was going to save them, gather some plan, regroup with the others and fix everything.

Strange knows something no one else does, not even the audience — he literally knows the events of Endgame. He knows that the steps he took were pushing them in the right direction (ie saving Tony bc otherwise Nebula would’ve been left alone on Titan with the Milano and I’m sure Tony has a big part to play).

I’m desperately trying not to lose hope. I’m still pretty torn up over Infinity War and I’m really really hoping Endgame fixes what needs to be fixed. Movies are, for some, an escape. And I really hope they don’t fuck us over any more than they already had, or I’m really going to throw in the towel. But I’m hopeful, with really no basis to be hopeful. I want a happy ending for my heroes, I think after all the shit, they deserve that much. I mean, they showed a trailer for Spider-Man 2, so obviously things get wrapped up in at least some sense.

So, here’s to hoping.

And I really hope they don’t fuck us over any more than they already had, or I’m really going to throw in the towel. But I’m hopeful, with really no basis to be hopeful. trail.content:
After Strange saw the futures, and the one that they win, then every action he made after that was towards the one scenario in which they win, even if they have to lose first. Giving up the stone to spare Tony’s life was a calculated decision! Sure, he probably respected Tony and wanted to spare him regardless.

But! In the situation they come out on top, Tony needed to be spared. If Strange hadn’t done that, Tony would have been killed, and Thanos would have probably got the stone some other way anyways. With the snap, Tony wasn’t going to die, and Strange knew that. He needed to give up the stone so Tony would live. He saw that Tony Stark was going to save them, gather some plan, regroup with the others and fix everything.

Strange knows something no one else does, not even the audience — he literally knows the events of Endgame. He knows that the steps he took were pushing them in the right direction (ie saving Tony bc otherwise Nebula would’ve been left alone on Titan with the Milano and I’m sure Tony has a big part to play).

I’m desperately trying not to lose hope. I’m still pretty torn up over Infinity War and I’m really really hoping Endgame fixes what needs to be fixed. Movies are, for some, an escape. And I really hope they don’t fuck us over any more than they already had, or I’m really going to throw in the towel. But I’m hopeful, with really no basis to be hopeful. I want a happy ending for my heroes, I think after all the shit, they deserve that much. I mean, they showed a trailer for Spider-Man 2, so obviously things get wrapped up in at least some sense.

So, here’s to hoping.

summary: ‘Star Wars: Episode IX’ Wraps Filming; Trailer Rumored To Be Attached To ‘Avengers: Endgame’
title: ‘Star Wars: Episode IX’ Wraps Filming; Trailer Rumored To Be Attached To ‘Avengers: Endgame’
body:
WHAT!?! That’s and awesome cross-promotion!!

J.J. Abrams posted a tweet to let fans know shooting for principal photography was finished on Star Wars: Episode IX. John Boyega posted on Instagram some final thoughts, as this also means his time on set has come to an end.

https://twitter.com/jjabrams/status/1096496364576493568

John Boyega’s time on set with Star Wars began with The Force Awakens in 2015, being brought to the cast by…

summary: These new ‘Avengers: Endgame’ theories explain what’s happening to Hulk
title: These new ‘Avengers: Endgame’ theories explain what’s happening to Hulk
body:
Wanna know what happened to the HULK?? Check this out! #Avengers, #Marvel, #Hulk, #Nerdom

When push came to shove in Avengers: Infinity War, Hulk failed to show up after taking a monster beating from Thanos early in the movie, the kind he usually delivers to bad guys. As much as Bruce Banner wanted Hulk to take over in New York and Wakanda, the green monster wanted none of it. However, we do know from toy leaks that not only will Hulk appear in Endgame, but he’ll do so as a much…

tags: i was going to post the gifs but i don't plan on failing my finals so...
summary: Okay so my birthday is on April 16 and I've been really sour about Endgame not releasing on my birthday and I have my French...
body:
Avengers: Endgame

Okay so my birthday is on April 16 and I’ve been really sour about Endgame not releasing on my birthday and I have my French finals tomorrow but I’m lying here in bed thinking about how 26th April could possibly be better than 16th April and I was crunching the numbers and oh my holy fucking gods…

26/04/2019

First four digits - 2+6+0+4 = 12

Last four digits - 2+0+1+9 = 12

What. In. The. Actual. Fuck.

reblog.comment:

summary: Gwyneth Paltrow Announces Retirement from the Marvel Cinematic Universe - There Are Caveats!
title: Gwyneth Paltrow Announces Retirement from the Marvel Cinematic Universe - There Are Caveats!
body:
Gwyneth Paltrow Announces Retirement from the Marvel Cinematic Universe – There Are Caveats!

Maybe its an indicator of what’s to come for the Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU), but Gwyneth Paltrow made the official announcement that she will no longer take on the role of Pepper Potts for future MCU films.

In an interview with Variety, Paltrow made the announcement, stating her good fortune in landing the role as the co-star to Robert Downey Jr. in the first  film.

View On WordPress

summary: Clip phỏng vấn ekip "Captain Marvel": 1001 điều bí ẩn hay ho được chính Nick Fury và Carol Danvers tiết lộ
title: Clip phỏng vấn ekip "Captain Marvel": 1001 điều bí ẩn hay ho được chính Nick Fury và Carol Danvers tiết lộ
body:
Clip phỏng vấn ekip “Captain Marvel”: 1001 điều bí ẩn hay ho được chính Nick Fury và Carol Danvers tiết lộ

Là bom tấn Marvel đầu tiên trong năm 2019, Captain Marvel (Đại Úy Marvel) hiện đang được người hâm mộ ngóng trông từng ngày. Trong buổi ra mắt báo chí tại Singapore, ê kíp làm phim gồm bộ đôi đạo diễn, Brie Larson, Samuel L. Jackson và Gemma Chan đã có nhiều chia sẻ về bộ phim cũng như tương lai của MCU (Vũ trụ Điện ảnh Marvel).

Brie Larson: “Tôi thích bắt cặp với Black Widow nhất MCU”

Clip phỏng…

summary: Sau trận chiến “khô máu” với Thanos, Iron Man sẽ “nghỉ hưu” và tìm người kế nhiệm?
title: Sau trận chiến “khô máu” với Thanos, Iron Man sẽ “nghỉ hưu” và tìm người kế nhiệm?
body:
Sau trận chiến “khô máu” với Thanos, Iron Man sẽ “nghỉ hưu” và tìm người kế nhiệm?

Sau Avengers: Endgame, Marvel sẽ chính thức bước sang một trang sử mới. Đây là thời điểm, một số những siêu anh hùng kì cựu sẽ phải “nghỉ hưu”, trong đó có Iron Man do Robert Downey Jr.thủ vai. Đối diện với một kẻ thù mạnh như Thanos, thương vong là điều không tránh khỏi. Câu hỏi được đặt ra hiện nay là: Bộ giáp của người sắt rất mạnh? Nếu bỏ đi thì thật sự quá đáng tiếc. Vì vậy hãng phim đã ấp ủ…

View On WordPress

summary: Harrowing ‘Avengers: Endgame’ theory will leave you in tears
title: Harrowing ‘Avengers: Endgame’ theory will leave you in tears
body:
This will be a movie for a lifetime!! #Avengers, #Marvel, #Nerdom

What’s great about the numerous Avengers 4 theories that we get to see daily is that they seldom propose happy endings. It’s as if fans have been trained perfectly by the Russos, Markuses, and McFeelys who directed and wrote several Marvel movies in the past. We’ve often explained that Endgame, like Infinity War, will break our hearts because the filmmakers have been steadily upping the ante.…

View On WordPress
